result.execSummary:
The defendant Nichlaus Roland Krauch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments, Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nichlaus Roland Krauch

records.addlTxt:
Zoom appearances.
Counsel waived.
NO CONTEST plea entered to count 2, disorderly conduct-dvo.   Convicted.
The State moves to dismiss and read in counts 1 and 3.  Motion granted.
The Court imposes a $50.00 fine plus costs, total of $616.00, to be paid by 11-15-22 or 12 days county jail for failure to pay.
DNA sample ordered.
Minutes.
Plea date on September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Order appointing counsel is denied because the court finds the person is not indigent.
Scheduling conference on October 12, 2022 at 10:50 am.
Further proceedings on September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Further proceedings scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Petition for Appointment of an Attorney;  Affidavit of Indigency.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.   Initial appearance is reset to 07-21-22 at 10:30 a.m.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Nichlaus Roland Krauch
Current: 4601 Calumet Avenue, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 07-01-2022)
Prior: 4921 Expo Dr, Manitowoc, WI 54220

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of battery (DVO).  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-07-22 at 10:30 a.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant is to have no contact with R.M.S. and P.J.S. and any premises they may occupy.   Third party contact allowed for child visits.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.

Order to Seal Probable Cause Statement.
